Profile.Title: User information
Profile.DeleteAccount: ⚠ Delete this account and all related data

Error.PasswordMismatch: Both passwords must match each other.

Error.HasSpaces: Sign-in name cannot contain space characters
Error.ConsecutiveDashes: Sign-in name cannot contain consecutive dashes
Error.Unknown: The sign-in name is not registered.

Error.PasswordMismatch: Passwords you typed do not match each other.
Error.SameAsUsername: Password cannot be the same as your sign-in name.
Error.NeedUpperCaseLetters: Password must contain at least one capital letter.
Error.NeedLowerCaseLetters: Password must contain at least one lower case letter.
Error.NeedDigits: Password must contain at least one number
Error.NeedSpecialCharacters: Password must contain at least one special character (!, @, $, etc...)
Error.HasSpaces: Your password cannot contain space characters
Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

Error.NotEnrolled: No PIN was enrolled for this user.

Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

Error.NotEnrolled: No PIN was enrolled for this user.
No fingerprints were enrolled for this user.

Create.Title: Enroll a finger
Create.Prompt: Place your finger on a reader several times.

Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

QualityCode.NoImage: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.TooLight: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.TooDark: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.TooNoisy: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.LowContrast: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.NotEnoughFeatures: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.NotCentered: Swipe the central part of the finger tip.
QualityCode.NotAFinger: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.TooLeft: Move your finger to the right.
QualityCode.TooRight: Move your finger to the left.
QualityCode.TooStrange: The quality of the fingerprint scan is not good enough to be used.
QualityCode.TooSkewed: Swipe your finger in a straight line.
QualityCode.TooShort: Swipe finger from first joint to tip.
QualityCode.PressureTooHard: Swipe your finger with light pressure.
QualityCode.PressureTooLight: Swipe your finger with more pressure.
QualityCode.WetFinger: Dry your finger and try again.
QualityCode.TooSmall: Scan entire area from tip to first joint.
QualityCode.RotatedTooMuch: Lift your finger and try again. Place it flat on the fingerprint reader.

Error.NoMatch: The card is not recognized or does not match the sign-in name.

Create.Title: Enroll a card
Create.Prompt: Present a card you want to enroll.

Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

Error.NoMatch: The card is not recognized or does not match the sign-in name.

Error.InvalidPin: The card cannot be accessed because the wrong PIN was presented.
Error.Blocked: The card cannot be accessed because the maximum number of PIN entry attempts has been reached.

OTP.Title: One-Time Password
OTP.Details:
Use the Authenticator app to obtain a one-time use code,
or get the code sent to you by

Type.Software: I'd like to use my phone, tablet or another mobile device.
Type.Hardware: I'd like to use a hardware token.

Create.Title: One-Time Password
Create.PromptPhone: Enter full phone number (including a country code)
Create.PromptQRCode: or scan the QR Code using an authentication app on your device
Create.PromptCode: Enter the One-Time Password once it appeares on your device

Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

SentBy.email: A challenge code was sent to your registered email. Check your inbox and enter the code here, or
SentBy.sms: A challenge code was messaged to your registered phone. Check your SMS and enter the code here, or
SentBy.push: A challenge request was sent to your device. Check your device notifications and approve the sign in, or

Error.NotSupported: OTP support is not enabled on the server.
Error.NoPhone: No phone number is registered for this user.
Error.NoEmail: No e-mail address is registered for this user.

Face.Title: Face
Face.Usage: Have your camera ready, place your face in front of the camera then press Start.

Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

Quality.NoFace: No face detected. Try improving lighting conditions.
Quality.TooSmall: You are too far away from the camera. Please move closer.
Quality.TooBig: You are too close to the camera. Please move farther away.
Quality.TooMany: Multiple faces detected. Please have only one face in the camera.

Error.NoCamera: To use face authentication, connect a camera.
Error.NotEnrolled: No face has been enrolled for this user.
Error.CameraAccessDenied: To use face authentication, allow access to the camera in your browser.
Error.CameraNotReadable: Could not start video stream. Make sure the camera is not being used by another application.
Error.CameraConstraintError: The selected camera does not meet the minimum constraints required.

U2F.Title: FIDO Key
U2F.Usage: Insert your FIDO token then press Start.
U2F.Prompt: Tap, press the button on, or re-insert your FIDO key.

Error.AccessDenied: Access denied. Probably your logon is expired or invalidated.

Error.NoMatch: The FIDO key does not match the sign-in name.
Error.NotEnrolled: No FIDO key has been enrolled for this user.
Error.NotSupported: FIDO key support is not enabled.
Error.u2f: OTHER_ERROR: The FIDO key is not recognized.
Error.u2f: BAD_REQUEST: The FIDO key is not recognized.
Error.u2f: CONFIGURATION_UNSUPPORTED: The client configuration is not supported.
Error.u2f: DEVICE_INELIGIBLE: The FIDO key is not recognized.
Error.u2f: TIMEOUT: The FIDO key authentication took too long. Please try again.

Error.NoMatch: Answers to security questions do not match to the sign-in name.
